file_content.text: I'll be sure to report your excellent work to my superiors.
Agent Veld was able to relay a message to me. Your assistance is appreciated.
As are these code cylinders you gathered. Rest assured, we will find them most useful. Again, my thanks.
Still no communications from Agent Veld. Are you having difficulties?
Good day, Cipher Nine--yes, I know your identity. You may call me Watcher Eight. I have a mission for you.
Pardon me. Watcher Eight, Imperial Intelligence. Your rise with the Sith has been well documented. Might you have a moment to assist me?
Your reputation precedes you. Watcher Eight, Imperial Intelligence. I'm authorized to hire anyone I need, and I need the best.
Good day. Watcher Eight, Imperial Intelligence. I've heard of your successes. I need a team that's capable and discreet.
Agent Veld, my top field operative, has failed to check in. Instead, I received some garbled distress signal.
I will not abandon Agent Veld. I need him found.
Whatever prompted the distress signal, Veld could already have fallen victim to it.
He may be dead.
Your expert opinion notwithstanding, he's survived worse missions without a scratch.
Knowing Agent Veld's task could be the key to finding him.
What's his mission?
I can't risk exposing the details of a field agent's mission.
Maybe you should consider writing him off.
Veld sounds useless.
I'd rather not discard an excellent operative at the first sign of trouble.
I can give you Agent Veld's last known position, near the Republic's main landing field. But the rest would be up to you.
If you know my designation, you know I can cope without backup.
That's not a problem, sir.
Both Agent Veld and his mission are in good hands.
Not a problem.
We'll ensure your agent is safe, and his mission completed.
Leave it to us.
Sounds dull, but all right.
Glad to hear it. His distress signal was sent from these coordinates.
I'll send him an alert to watch for you, but it may not get through. Good luck.
Your Agent Veld will have to cope on his own.
Forget it. [Refuse quest]
I see. Perhaps someone else will be willing to rescue a man in need.
No distractions, please, I have an important matter to consider.
